gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.enchanting: Place bookshelves in a square around the infuser on up to two layers. And don't forget, corners are counted, too!
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.unknown_en: This enchantment is too powerful for an infuser with such little enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.lowPower1: Further increasing the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.lowPower2: Modifying the level for this enchantment requires an infuser with more enchanting power.
gui.enchantinginfuser.tooltip.destroyGea: Destroy enchanted gear to learn about the enchantments.
